flawed_nl_solution:
Earl was on the 1 + 5 = <<1+5=3>>3th floor after going up 5 floors.
When he went down 2 floors, he was on the 3 - 2 = <<3-2=1>>1th floor.
Since he went up 7 floors, he was then on the 1 + 7 = <<1+7=8>>8th floor.
Since he is 9 floors away from the top of the building, therefore the building has 8 + 9 = <<8+9=17>>17 floors.
#### 17

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 3. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
